column4: I couldn't ssh to my server from work -> home today, and I was sitting just racking my brains as to what it could be. And I got home, and I was fucking around with the box, I rebooted it, reinstalled sshd, etc etc.
And then I realized the ethenet cable had falled out of the back of the router. :(
Is there a command to view the dependencys of an application?
